testcaseName: Patient is 65 years and has been administered the third dose of the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine at an interval of 6 months

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient that is 65 years or older and has been administered a third dose of the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine at an interval of 6 months after the most previous dose, that the dose is valid.  A second monovalent dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
v4.27  Updated test case to a fixed date test case to retain previous booster recommendations before the updated Covid-19 Interim Clinical Guidance (09/02/2022). 
v4.22 - Updated the test case per the updated Clinical Consideration guidance for a second booster dose (March 30, 2022).
